title: Poland, 1939: World War Two begins
itunes:title: Poland, 1939: World War Two begins
itunes:subtitle: Roger Moorhouse tells the story of the 1939 battle for Poland that saw the country dismembered by Nazi Germany and the Soviet Union. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
As we reach the 80th anniversary of the outbreak of World War Two, historian Roger Moorhouse tells the story of the 1939 battle for Poland that saw the country dismembered by Nazi Germany and the Soviet Union. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
